title: How does one get championship zed?
body:
i tried to purchase the skin but it said it was "unavailable"

does anyone have any answers to why im unable to buy it?

replies.body: I think, we can purchase Championship Zed, during World Championship finals.
I don't have any details on unreleased or new content.  Any details info on this will likely be posted on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page.  Hang tight!

guys! until one of the main esports events happen , you can only get championship zed from capsules and shit like that.Idk why they would do this... the only reason i can think of is to get you to level up more and play the game or they want you to buy rp in order to get more chests and keys.This will make more money for riot and add some rarity into the game.
{{champion:238}}

I WANT THIS CHAMPIONSHIP ZED VERY VERY VERY MUCH DO IT JUST FOR X-MAS RIOT PLSS  EVERYONE WHO DONT HAVE THIS SKIN WILL BUY IT


                                                                                  MERRY X-MAS

Riot pls do championship zed vailable on shop everyone wants to buy it plss do it now for X-mas 



                                           
                                                                                   MERRY X-MAS
I have the same problem i want to buy championship zed and now is the e-sports event and i still can't. God i want that skin please help me riot
It was some days not long ago when champion ship zed was available but he got unavailable not long after
yeah me too the same problem riot help
AH, i see, i only joined this season so i wasnt aware they only went up at a certain time, my mistake, thanks {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Probably when the worlds event begins

You will be able to buy it when Riot decide that the skin is for sale. 
Generally the championship skins are Available in some E-sports Events.
Guys but I've seen some people using Championship Zed
